info.description:
FieldFuze Backend API with DynamoDB and Telnyx Integration

## ðŸ”¥ AUTHENTICATION FLOW:
### Step 1: Register Customer
**POST /auth/register** - Create customer account (no token generated)
`{"email": "user@example.com", "username": "john", "password": "pass123", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe"}`

## ðŸš€ QUICK AUTHENTICATION:
### Using the Authorize Button (Recommended)
1. Click the **ðŸ”“ Authorize** button (top right of any API section)
2. In the authorization dialog, use the **Login** form:
- Enter your **Username** (email)
- Enter your **Password**
- Click **Login** button
3. Your Bearer token will be **automatically applied** to all API calls!
4. All protected endpoints will now work without manual token entry

### Manual Token Entry (Alternative)
If you prefer manual setup: Get token from `/auth/login`, then paste `Bearer YOUR_TOKEN` in the Authorization field
info.title: FieldFuze Backend API

post.description: Check worker health and automatically restart if unhealthy

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to auto-restart worker

get.description: Check if the infrastructure worker is healthy and get health details

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to check worker health

post.description: Restart the infrastructure worker with optional force parameter to restart even if currently running

409.description: Conflict - Worker is running and force=false

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to restart worker

get.description: Retrieve detailed status of the infrastructure worker including execution state, progress, and health

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve worker status

post.description: Create a new organization with specified details

500.description: Internal Server Error - Organization creation failed

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve user list

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

500.description: Internal Server Error - Login failed

post.description: Logout user and revoke current JWT token

500.description: Internal Server Error - Logout failed

get.description: Retrieve a list of all organizations

parameters.description: Filter by organization status (active, inactive, archived)
parameters.name: status

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve organizations
Internal Server Error - Registration failed

get.description: Retrieve a list of all roles

parameters.description: Filter by role status (active, inactive, archived)
parameters.name: status

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve roles

post.description: Create a new role with specified permissions

500.description: Internal Server Error - Role creation failed

404.description: Not Found - Role does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve role

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid role ID or data

404.description: Not Found - Role does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to update role

404.description: Not Found - Role does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete role

post.description: Generate or refresh JWT token (legacy endpoint - use /login instead)

500.description: Internal Server Error - Token generation failed

patch.description: Update user information by ID. Note: Role and Roles fields are ignored - use dedicated role assignment endpoints instead.

parameters.description: Update user request (role/roles fields will be ignored)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid user ID or data

404.description: Not Found - User does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to update user

post.description: Validate a JWT token and return user information with roles

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid token in request body

404.description: Not Found - User does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve user

post.description: Assign an existing role by ID to a user

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid user ID or role ID

404.description: Not Found - User or role does not exist

409.description: Conflict - User already has this role

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to assign role

delete.description: Remove an existing role from a user

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid user ID or role ID

404.description: Not Found - User or role does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to remove role

data.description: Any response data (can be map, struct, list, etc.)

models.RegisterUser.description: User registration request with account details

force.description: Force restart even if worker is currently running

BearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
